PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-06402008-04-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  INDUSTRY
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2001-1592 of August 2001 by removing the name SchoolNet and inserting the name Computers for Schools; and authorizing the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY to transfer, lease or loan public property such as used electronic hardware and software for the delivery of the Computers for Schools Program, for the period beginning April 1, 2008 and ending March 31, 2013.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
